article_title: Blue Cross & Blue Shield of RI Medicare plan enrollment surges as UnitedHealthcare drops physicians
article_text:
Blue Cross & Blue Shield of RI Medicare plan enrollment surges as UnitedHealthcare drops physicians

Blue Cross & Blue Shield of Rhode Island has experienced a dramatic enrollment surge — the biggest ever — in its Medicare Advantage plan. The new customers are apparently leaving UnitedHealthcare of New England.

article_metadata.description: Blue Cross & Blue Shield of Rhode Island has experienced a dramatic enrollment surge  the biggest ever  in its Medicare Advantage plan. The new customers are apparently leaving UnitedHealthcare of New England.
article_metadata.author: Felice J. Freyer
